page.title: 15INTERVIEW WITH AN OLD PERSON
page.content: On Wednesday 3rd July Mr Drayson and Mr.Phillips came to our school to talk to us about life in the village when they were younger. Mr.Drayson has lived in the village all his life but Mr. Phillips moved here when he was two. Mr.Drayson is 65 and Mr.Phillips is 58. They both went to school in the village_Mr.Phillips leaving at 11 after he had passed a scholarship to go to the boy's Grammar School and Mr. Drayson staying at the same school until he left at the age of 14. The old school had 3 teachers and 3 classes with an average of 45 in each class. When he left school,Mr.Drayson was a delivery boy for the grocery shop in the village and he told us he didn't earn much money. Mr.Phillips said he only got money for helping his Dad.
